thread.title: Ground News - End ‘unlawful killings’ in occupied West Bank, UN tells Israel
thread.title_full: Ground News - End ‘unlawful killings’ in occupied West Bank, UN tells Israel

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - End ‘unlawful killings’ in occupied West Bank, UN tells Israel
text:
Summary by Ground News UN report warns of rapidly deteriorating human rights situation in West Bank . Violence across the West Bank and occupied East Jerusalem has flared since Israel's war on the Gaza Strip began on October 7. More than 21,000 Palestinians in Gaza have been killed, most of them civilians, after about 1,200 people were killed in Hamas attacks in southern Israel. UN has verified the deaths of at least 300 Palestinians in the West West Bank, including 79 children. Share menu More
